title: Fundamentals of Microbiology (11th Ed)(gnv64)
description: Fundamentals of Microbiology (11th Ed) by Jeffrey C. Pommerville Jones & Bartlett | May 2017 | ISBN-10: 1284100952 | True PDF | 1138 pages | 142 mb Pommerville's Fundamentals of Microbiology has done it again, as the easy choice for introductory microbiology was just made easier. Now with a new modern and intuitive design, a deeper focus on career application, and exciting new features, the Eleventh Edition has raised the bar for introductory microbiology textbooks. Fundamentals of Microbiology is a true learning solution. Jeff Pommerville invites you to discover microbiology as no other author can, with his relatable examples and smooth writing style. Features such as Investigating the Microbial World, MicroInquiry, and Chapter Challenges are student-friendly resources designed to teach concepts and encourage practical application. Instructors will be pleased to find the organizational framework of the text reflects the Curriculum Guidelines for Undergraduate Microbiology as recommended by the American Society for Microbiology and also addresses the AAAS "Vision and Change" recommendations.. CONTENTS Preface . XIII The Student Experience . XIX Teaching Tools . XXII Acknowledgments . XXVI About the Author . XXVII To the Student—Study Smart . XXIX PART I Foundations of Microbiology 1 PART II The Genetics of Microorganisms 201 PART III The Control of Microorganisms 275 Part IV Bacterial Diseases of Humans 351 PART V Viruses and Eukaryotic Microorganisms 493 PART VI Interactions and Impact of Microorganisms with Humans 673 PART VII Environmental and Applied Microbiology 843 Appendix A Metric Measurement and Temperature Conversion Chart . A-1 Appendix B CDC Summary of Notifiable Diseases in the United States 2014 . B-1 Appendix C Pronouncing Organism Names . C-1 Appendix D Answers to Self-Test Questions . D-1 Appendix E Answers to Clinical Case, Investigating the Microbial World, and MicroInquiry Questions . E-1 Appendix F Answers to Chapter Challenge Questions . F-1 Glossary . G-1 Index .
